text: I great place to work for free, most pizza is good to eat, the gimmick pizzas are terrible, i.e. stuffed crust because the dough gets stretched to thin, and cheesy bites because the cheese melts and runs out of the bites.

text: Got a wonderful 1hr+ late, cold, uncut pizza. Will be calling tomorrow for full refund. Horrible driver, he was like 80 years old and had no business driving.
